about:
I am a dedicated Full-Stack Developer with a professional background in Welder - Technical Support, driven by a passion for technology and a commitment to solving problems while contributing value to others' lives by developing resourceful applications. 

 As a Full-Stack Developer, I employ a robust skill set encompassing HTML5, CSS3, and the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.Js, React.JS, Node.JS), along with proficiency in SQL, to create comprehensive and efficient full-stack applications. Drawing from my prior experience, I bring valuable soft skills to the table, including adept problem-solving, effective time management, and strong team-management capabilities. These skills have been honed in collaborative environments, enabling me to contribute to collective goals within teams and organizations. 

 On a personal note, my love for reading books, passion for travel, and appreciation for music have not only enriched my life but also provided me with diverse perspectives that enable me to thrive in multifaceted environments. I am excited to bring this unique blend of technical expertise and interpersonal skills to contribute meaningfully to future professional endeavors.
